content: easter napkin rabbit a crocheted napkin yarn vivchari ethno-cotton 100 g/ 600 m hook 1 75 mm the size of the finished napkin 28 * 29 cm crochet gauge 27 stitches in width and 15 row in height = 10 x 10 cm you can crochet with any other yarn then the size of the napkin will be larger or smaller choose a hook to match your yarn chain stitch if you work outermost on the hook the chain stitch will often be too tight 1 chain stitch should be as long as 1 double/treble_crochet is wide 1 chain stitch double_crochet i hope you like the pattern and will crjchet this napkin
